segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, cascading onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange to watch the adult woman, completely unaware of the mess she’s creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on drying the plate is almost mesmerizing, but at the same time, it concerns me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so oblivious with that puddle growing beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are quite a sight; that boy on the stool is defying gravity right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a rush of anxiety watching him reach toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The look on the girl’s face makes me smile, though; she’s so eager for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
